name: Les Fleursword
description: This is an Otome game with well-praised CGs and fappable storyline. Knight Adelaide, as the captain of her Order, was cast mysterious spells by a magician when she was on a mission. And because of this, how would unspeakable events happen to her?
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP 处理器: 1.2 GHz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
